alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips, northeastern Coahoma and southwestern Tunica Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 327 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Friars Point, or 10 miles south of Helena-West Helena, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonestown, Friars Point, Dundee, Kings, Coahoma, Lula, Rudyard, Moon, Preston Place, Westover, Jeffries, Delta, Roseacres, Matagorda, Hamlin, Rich, Powell, Danforth and Clover Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
